reviewText:
It's been 7 years since the bad boys 2 scenes showed up in the Blu-ray Disc demo discs. And I don't think we'll ever know why it took so long to be released on blu-ray. Whatever the reason is, this is what Bad Boys fans have been waiting for. It's not perfect, but I'll take it!

The set: This set contains two individual Blu-ray cases, one for each film. I wish they had released the two movies separately (two UPC barcodes are created, one for each individual package, so I wouldn't be surprised if these discs are released individually in the future.) Each movie also comes with a separate Ultraviolet code.

Bad Boys: This is not the same as the previous standalone Blu-ray release. The cover art has the "20th anniversary edition" label on top, and the cover art is different, so is the specs (different subtitle options). When you open it up, you will find one disc that looks identical to the previous release (same press art on the disc itself). Rest assured, once you pop in the disc, the content is different from the previous one. Different menu style (I actually like the old menu, but the new menu agrees with the Bad Boys 2 menu). The video quality is also sharper than the previous release. It is the new remastered in 4k video source.

Bad Boys 2: This is the only way to own this movie on Blu-ray now. And I really bought the set just for this. The cover art looks exactly the same as the DVD. When you open the case, the disc press art is also identical to the DVD release. This makes the two discs (bad boys 1 and bad boys 2) look very different. But none of that matters once you pop in the disc. The video and audio quality is awesome. I wish they had opted for a 7.1 track. But there's only a really good DTS HD-MA 5.1 track. This disc has fewer subtitle options than Bad Boys 1.

In conclusion, the contents of these discs are great in terms of video and audio quality, and extra contents. However, minor details makes them feel like two standalone releases slapped together at the last minute. Different cover art styles, different disc press art styles, different audio and subtitle options. If you just want to see what Bad Boys 2 looks and sounds like on Blu-ray, go for it! This set is very reasonably priced.
Just got this set yesterday, and FINALLY, Bad Boys 2 in HD, and it is just as beautiful as imagined! Need I say more!!!!!

No complaints here whatsoever. Both films look spectacular and the DTS-HD MA 5.1 audio tracks are even better. Bad Boys 2 especially looks really good, finally making its long awaited debut on Blu. The audio is ridiculous, giving your surround sound system a proper workout. This is definitely one of the more active sound mixes I've heard for a film and with the amount of action these films have, you're sure to be pleased. Most of the extras are carry overs from the DVDs but there's a lot of stuff to pore through with the Bad Boys 2 disc having the more interesting selection. The discs come in their own individual cases housed in a flimsy slip cover but also come included with Ultraviolet codes for each film. Fans of the boys should be very happy with this presentation.

Finally!!!!! the time is here, albeit 12 years later, for Bad Boys II to be released on Blu-Ray. I've yet watched the first one on Blu-Ray but the second is an immensely pleasant upgrade to the DVD I've rewatched dozens of times over the years. I won't review the film itself, there's enough of that everywhere and clearly I find it very entertaining, but have always thought it was a gorgeous movie for Blu-Ray. The transfer is superb, everything pops the way it should, and sound is great too.

For those worried about playback, no need as these discs are region free. Ordered mine all the way from South Africa and couldn't be happier. Great product and great service from Amazon.

BAD BOYS (1995)
PLOT...
Marcus Burnett is a family man. Mike Lowry is a foot-loose and fancy free ladies' man. Both are Miami policemen, and both have 72 hours to reclaim a consignment of drugs stolen from under their station's nose. To complicate matters, in order to get the assistance of the sole witness to a murder, they have to pretend to be each other.

The bad boys movies are certainly badass movies in terms of a kick-ass cast, great buddy comedy and plenty of adrenalin filled action! Never since the days of leathal weapon has there been a great duo team up, both Lawrence and Smith are on top form together, Michael Bay is a very over the top director and gets plenty of action out of the story, the bad boys series is most certainly his best work, great story, funny moments, great violent action, most importantly a fantastic cast to pull it all off making it a concrete classic!

BAD BOYS 2 (2003)
PLOT..
Narcotics cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Bennett head up a task force investigating the flow of ecstasy into Miami. Their search leads to a dangerous kingpin, whose plan to control the city's drug traffic has touched off an underground war. Meanwhile, things get sexy between Mike and Syd, Marcus's sister.

Bad boys 2 really picks up a whole lot more than the original, its a real kick-ass superior sequel in every way, the story is way bigger with some larger than life and incredible action scenes and intense shoot-outs, this could easily stand as one of the best action movies ever made, the cast once again is amazing Lawrence and Smith on top form once again really stepping their game up too, the rest of the support cast is amazing too! The soundtrack like the original is up-beat hip and cool even now, after all these years these are still fantastic action movies, great cast, great comedy and humour between the 2 main stars, superb action directing from Bay making this series a must have classic!

Blu-ray picture quality looks great in HD

This blue ray is worth the money. It gives you both movies for the price of one. The audio is fantastic and it really allows me to experience the sounds of the Ferrari, the gun shots, and the helicopters flying overhead in my surround sound system. One of the best features is how sharp the video is, especially in the second movie (Bad Boys II). You have to see the the Ferrari chase scene in Bad Boys II. I thought this movie was sharp in HD, and bought it to my best friends house and played in 4K upscale, the movie was fantastic.

Fantastic sound, sharp images, and one of the best upscaled movies I have seen. You cannot miss.
It is a great collection and just nice that I did not own the part one on Blu Ray . Loaded with great action too.
